text: unkalil oruvarukku maranam varumunnare, nam unkalukku alitta poruliliruntu, tana tarmam ceytu kollunkal, (avvaru ceyyatu maranikkum camayam); "en iraivane! En tavanaiyai enakku ciritu pirpatuttak kutata? Appatiyayin nanum tana tarmam ceytu salihana (nalla)varkalil oruvanaka akivituvene" enru kuruvan
